name: A Day in the Life of Magpie
name_original: A Day in the Life of Magpie
description:
Join Magpie!  He has been tasked with restocking items by his bosses.  Explore a quaint, little town, collect shiny and hidden items, and talk to the townsfolk.

"A Day in the Life of Magpie" is a cozy, short game intended to be a relaxing and fun experience.  It is a story about self-reflection and choosing to pursue one's passions.  I had a blast creating the character, story, and environment for this game.  I hope you enjoy!

Project created by Savannah Snyder

Website: savannahsnyderarts.com

Socials: @SSSnyderArts

Moore College of Art & Design 2022
